opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of August, 2004, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, and the case is remanded to the Commonwealth Court for consideration of this Court’s decision in Schadler v. Zoning Hearing Bd. of Weisenberg Township, 850 A.2d 619 (Pa.2004).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
